general_advisory: Provide light irrigation to paddy nursery. Keep provision of critical irrigation for rabi crops.  survey  for insect pest attack and take necessary steps. Complete earthing up in rabi crops. Due to weather there is chances of powdery mildew in various crops, to manage spray sulphur powder @ 1 kg in 200 liters of water.

advisory: Before application of fertilizer, drain out excess water and apply 16 kg Nitrogen per acre at 3 weeks stage after transplanting and after application,  again keep ponding water.
The matured siliqua should be harvested to avoid the shattering of seeds.

Due to forecast of increased temperature, provide critical stage irrigation to the crop  at flowering and milking stage.  There is chances of leaf spot attack. Apply 600 g Mancozeb diluted in 200 liters of water.
Due to rise in temperature, provide irrigation in critical stage.
Due to rise in temperature, after sowing provide light irrigation.
After flowering, do not disturb the soil as peg formation will be damaged.
Provide light irrigation to the crop. Go for intercultivation and apply 12 kg Nitrogen after 3 weeks of transplanting.
Due to bacterial wilt apply Streptocyclin @ 1 g in 10 liters of water.
Provide the feed mixture according to the body weight.
Provide clean and sufficient drinking water to the animals.
